      • sendTeamMessage

        public void sendTeamMessage(org.bukkit.entity.Player sender,
                            String message,
                            QuartzTeam team)
        Sends a team-message from the given sender.
        Parameters:
        sender - The sender.
        message - The message to send.
        team - If not null, this message will be considered as an external message from another player to this team.

      • toggleChatForPlayer

        public boolean toggleChatForPlayer(UUID playerID)
        Toggles the chat between the global chat and the team chat.
        Parameters:
        playerID - The chat of this player will be toggled.
        Returns:
        true if the chat is now the team chat; false else.

      • toggleChatForPlayer

        public boolean toggleChatForPlayer(UUID playerID,
                                   QuartzTeam team)
        Toggles the chat between the global chat and the team chat.
        Parameters:
        playerID - The chat of this player will be toggled.
        team - The team to chat with. If null, the player's team will be used.
        Returns:
        true if the chat is now the team chat; false else.

      • toggleChatForPlayer

        public boolean toggleChatForPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Toggles the chat between the global chat and the team chat.
        Parameters:
        player - The chat of this player will be toggled.
        Returns:
        true if the chat is now the team chat; false else.

      • toggleChatForPlayer

        public boolean toggleChatForPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                   QuartzTeam team)
        Toggles the chat between the global chat and the team chat.
        Parameters:
        player - The chat of this player will be toggled.
        team - The team to chat with. If null, the player's team will be used.
        Returns:
        true if the chat is now the team chat; false else.

      • isTeamChatEnabled

        public boolean isTeamChatEnabled(UUID playerID,
                                 QuartzTeam team)
        Returns true if the team chat is enabled for the given player.
        Parameters:
        playerID - The player's UUID.
        team - If non-null, this will check if the given player is spying the current team.
        Returns:
        true if the team chat is enabled for the given player.
